uk.ac.ebi.ontoapi.file
Class OntologyManagerSingleton

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.ontoapi.file.OntologyManagerSingleton

public class OntologyManagerSingleton
extends java.lang.Object

Employs singleton pattern to serve a static reference to OWLOntologyManager. This fixes some issues with out of heap memory exceptions.

Author:
$Id: OntologyManagerSingleton.java 8273 2009-07-29 17:10:50Z tomasz $
